channel.title: People getting sued for Private servers
channel.description: What can you do to avoid this or why are they doing it.

item.title: People getting sued for Private servers
item.dc:creator: @darkgama13 darkgama13
item.description:
@darkgama13 wrote:

i never said you were wrong (excuse my bad Language) dumbass and yes they can sue but they will not all ways win like i said 65% you have 35% of winning (thats very low) i know cuase i been sued by them why do you think i wasnt one for like 3 days i was at court gosh (they drop the case cuase they couldnt prove that i erver made it so i got lucky) so really i am not wrong gosh

Read full topic
item.source: People getting sued for Private servers

item.title: People getting sued for Private servers
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

[quote=“darkgama13, post:18, topic:218734”]hey i_pk_pjers_i yes your right about they can sue you in court but they may not win all the time about 65% of the time they wil but if you prove that you told them you gonna make a private server and you had them sign a contrak(highly unlikely but ok lol) and you showed them your video you might just post on youtube and then if they say sure you can host it (well that would again be highly unlikely)but you have a 35% chance of winning a sue they might give you
and wtf reallt i am sorry but the post you made was completly worng becuase yes they can sue you heck i can sue you for use my source i might release tommor or in a few weeks(like i would lol i wouldnt though cuase that would be mean) but yes runescape A.K.A Jagex can sue you for not doing what they ask[/quote]no it is still their intellectual property and code/graphics so they will always win, unless you re-do the WHOLE client and EVERYTHING and basically make a new game. and no you cant, because you didnt copyright your source with 10+ lawyers signing a contract. and they can sue you for hosting it at all, ask stork or reines if you dont believe me. if they take you to court, they WILL win because they have all rights to it because it is using their code and EVERYTHING else. so you are wrong.

Read full topic
item.source: People getting sued for Private servers

item.title: People getting sued for Private servers
item.dc:creator: @darkgama13 darkgama13
item.description:
@darkgama13 wrote:

hey i_pk_pjers_i yes your right about they can sue you in court but they may not win all the time about 65% of the time they wil but if you prove that you told them you gonna make a private server and you had them sign a contrak(highly unlikely but ok lol) and you showed them your video you might just post on youtube and then if they say sure you can host it (well that would again be highly unlikely)but you have a 35% chance of winning a sue they might give you
and wtf reallt i am sorry but the post you made was completly worng becuase yes they can sue you heck i can sue you for use my source i might release tommor or in a few weeks(like i would lol i wouldnt though cuase that would be mean) but yes runescape A.K.A Jagex can sue you for not doing what they ask

Read full topic
item.source: People getting sued for Private servers

item.title: People getting sued for Private servers
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:12, topic:218734”]Unless you are selling membership, or disobey them when they tell you to close down your server, I wouldn’t worry about legal action being taken. For example, stork’s old server ‘stork pk’ was taken down because Jagex had contacted stork telling him to take down the server or they would take legal action. [/quote]yeah, but they tell all rsc servers to get taken down. they dont bother taking down rs2 servers because they constantly update rs2.

[quote=“wtfnub, post:15, topic:218734”]you cant get sued for a private server. jagex knows bout moparscape and silab. if u didnt notice theres always runescape ads at the top. jagex makes them put it there. no1 got sued all lies.[/quote]sorry, but holy fucking shit you are stupid… you can get sued and lose in court because it steals their intellectual property, as well as code and graphics. they have every right to take down servers, and would win in court.
about the ads: they dont put the ads there you idiot, the ads are random from google (hence it saying “[size=22pt]ads by google[/size]”). shit, your stupid. but then again, im sure you knew that jagex wouldnt want people stealing their game and all of their graphics and calling it their own, and letting people get away with running private servers of THEIR game. unless, you really are that stupid which i think you are.

Read full topic

item.source: People getting sued for Private servers

item.title: People getting sued for Private servers
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Unless you are selling membership, or disobey them when they tell you to close down your server, I wouldn’t worry about legal action being taken. For example, stork’s old server ‘stork pk’ was taken down because Jagex had contacted stork telling him to take down the server or they would take legal action.

Read full topic
item.source: People getting sued for Private servers

item.title: People getting sued for Private servers
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

They really have no reason too. Unless you’re making money off it.

The only thing that is theirs is the client. The server was made by WinterLove, and had nothing to do with RS2 server. He looked how the client sent packets and stuff, and made a server off the client and how it worked.

They have really no reason to sue, unless like I said; you’re making money off it.

Read full topic
item.source: People getting sued for Private servers
